data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you always face forward with your face towards the camera, you take a step right every single step you take to the camera. Take 9 steps left and return your eyes to start face forward and forward. Reverse the direction of the camera by moving your eyes to your right. So, the answer is Yes.

The following instructions are based on a single movement. You can return to the starting point by reversing the step order. So, the answer is Yes.
